website_summaries.verdict: Though it's not the best formula for everyone, those with acne-prone skin will like it.
pros: Doesn't contain harmful, unnatural ingredients, animal products, fragrance, or parabens, and is cruelty free
cons: A pricey cleanser for 8 ounces, but it's also made for tough problems that other cleansers may aggravate
Known to be somewhat harsh on sensitive skin

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Not for everyone. I’ve been having acne since I was 12...now I’m 34 and still getting them. Very frustrating. I was so excited to find out about Humane on Amazon due to amazing reviews. I’ve been using Humane for more than a month now and nothing changed. I still have acne. I’m noticing that my skin has become darker. Overall, it doesn’t work for my skin. Time to try something else. Update: The seller is nice to enough to contact me right after the review and offered 100% refund. I wasn’t expecting that. Since they stand behind their product, maybe you should go ahead and give it a try. Nothing to lose here.
customer_reviews.author: Mith Yeav

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive Skin BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE!! If you have sensitive skin, even a little, you will NOT want to use this product. I used it before my daughter tried it (thank goodness). I followed the directions and when I got done rinsing it off my skin was on fire and bright red. It took several hours for the redness to go away. I do NOT have sensitive skin or allergies. I will give it this. My pores were clean. I guess they would have to be after something like that. Complete waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Gillum

customer_reviews.title: Does not work at ALL!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item due to the high reviews and the praise given to this item by other reviewers. Upon receiving this face wash, I used it for about a month. In that timespan, my acne grew EXPONENTIALLY WORSE - with my face breaking out with dozens of pimples. I got new pimples that I did not even have before on my face as a result of using this face wash. As such, this item is completely worthless and TRASH. I would not recommend this to anyone looking to improve their acne condition. This product did the exact opposite of curing my acne - making it horrendously worse than it ever had been.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Only used for one night so far. But already love it. Really toned down all the breakouts happening on my face. Im so happy to find something that finally works!
customer_reviews.author: Makayla Farnsworth

customer_reviews.title: It actually works, amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I have been using this product for few days, every other day so it doesn't dry my skin. I am amazed how well it works. I am a chemist, so with great research and experiment on my own skin, I learned that benzoyl Peroxide was most effective on for my acne. Super glad to be using this product. Incredible customer service. I had a minor crack on my bottle and within 24hrs of emailing the manufacturer. they send me a new bottle. Grear product and customer service, I will be buying many of their products.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: actually works
customer_reviews.text: Been trying for years to find something that consistently gets rid of body breakouts from working out. This is the only thing to not only start clearing it up quickly, but also keeps working! (Definitely make sure you leave it on the full recommended 3-5 minutes though, it needs some time to penetrate and not just sit on top of your skin and be rinsed off!) I have only tried it on my face once, and it was very strong (but I also don't have very serious face blemishes, so it's still perfect for my shoulders and back)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUY NOW
customer_reviews.text: The best acne treatment I've ever tried. Benzoyl Peroxide is the only treatment that works for me. I used Proactiv for years but found the three-step process twice a day tedious, especially when I was in a rush or tired. I use humane once a day (twice is too drying for me) and have clear, bright skin with much less effort. My only caution is this bleaches everything. I used it in the shower once and bleached my bathmat with my footprints! Very important to rinse thoroughly and use old washcloths/towels.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Excelent product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is excellent. I used to use oxy 10% benzoyl peroxide, but over the years they seem to have changed the formula several times. It seemed to get progressively less effective for me. So I opted to make a change to Humane 10% and am very glad that I did. I now apply this twice daily along with a face cleaner and moisturizer and my face is very clean. Working very effectively and doesn't dry out my skin too much (if it does a dose of moisturizer fixes it).
customer_reviews.author: Stefan

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading all the great reviews. This product did not work for my son. He is a teenager with moderate acne and this product did not seem to help. It did dry out his skin but did nothing for the acne present. We have tried him leaving it on his face for various amounts of time to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: dalesandn

customer_reviews.title: Very strong even for combination skin
customer_reviews.text: At first this product seemed like it was good. My skin was feeling clean and I thought it was helping, well I had a reaction to where my face got extremely red. I kept using it thinking oh it’s just working. I have combination skin, it never usually gets extremely dry and can seem to handle harsher products. This was really too harsh I’m not sure if it’s the 10% benzoyl peroxide but it irritated my skin. Just be careful with it maybe don’t use it everyday right out of the gate because my skin isn’t sensitive and this created a big red irritated mess for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caused me eye allergy
customer_reviews.text: It causes me eye allergy. My eyelids become swollen and heavy to lift up. At first I never doubted the product and considered all the things I was eating/the summer heat etc. Then I stopped using it because it was making my face too itchy out of dryness (I think benzoyl peroxide is supposed to do that so no complains there) But I realized that this face wash is the culprit for my eye allergy when I used it again one day after almost a month. Stopped using it ever again. Now it’s winter time and I just give it one last chance before it goes into trash. But nope it is indeed the culprit .. gone to trash
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible bottle
customer_reviews.text: The pump that comes with the bottle is probably the most atrocious thing I've ever used. If you push lightly nothing will come out, so you have to keep applying pressure until the point that it just burst out and goes flying everywhere. Well this time in the shower I was pushing the pump to get the cream t o come out and it just squirted 2 feet straight into my eye and I am in severe pain while writing this I can barely open my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Yip

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the worst product I have ever used, it burned my face. I just used it today, I used it as instructed and put it on my face for 2 minutes and when I washed it it was burning and all my face was very red. It is still red and burning, like I am on fire. Hope this redness goes away soon and doesn't stay on my face! worst product ever! STAY AWAY
customer_reviews.author: Maisa

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: I’m struggling with mild acne. I tried everything but nothing worked. I bought it after extreme ratings and used every drop of this but nothing changed. 😔
customer_reviews.author: Arun Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing
customer_reviews.text: Worthless....didnt work at all and the product came with the tube from the pump about 3 inches longer than the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S

customer_reviews.title: Best Benzoyl Peroxide on the market
customer_reviews.text: Humane Benzoyl Peroxide wash is some of the best no-frills benzoyl peroxide on the market. It does not have an odor or unnecessary ingredients. That being said, whether or not benzoyl peroxide will solve your acne problems is another question. This wash does not drastically improve my skin, but I feel that it maintains my acne to an extent and I will continue to use it. I would love to see a larger sized bottle. If you're using Benzoyl Peroxide on your skin, I would definitely recommend trying Humane. While Humane is not overly drying compared to other Benzoyl Peroxide, remember to use a moisturizer (I use CeraVe) after washing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: didn’t change anything
customer_reviews.text: Product didn’t rlly work. I was SO hoping it would because I saw all of the great reviews but unfortunately it just didn’t work with my skin :,( it didn’t make anything worse it just didn’t help anything
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clears up Acne
customer_reviews.text: This product was amazing for my daughter who was having major acne issues. She has acne that almost looked inflamed and like a rash (very irritated skin). Her face cleared up within about a week of starting to use this product and has stayed this way with consistent use. She uses it every night along with a differen gel. It does dry her face out a bit but that is to be expected, and an acne moisturizer should be fine to use to help with the dryness. Highly recommend for someone struggling with acne. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me!
customer_reviews.text: It was strong, literally burning my face. I had to stop using it. It worked but my eye area was severely affected by this product. I am now trying different products, not clear the acne but maintain it as best as possible at 26
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: It works!:)
customer_reviews.text: Just after a couple of uses I noticed some results . Although my skin gets red for a few min upon application but that just feels to me that the product is doing it’s work. I haven’t been using the product consistently, however I will updating my review once I start using it on a daily basis. Lastly the customer service is great too.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Face turning red after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: The product should definitely work for people with strong acne. I have many zits but I wouldn't classify them as acne, they started to get fewer after 2 weeks, but then my skin started itching and was turning red. I didn't get the results I wanted to, probably because my skin problem isn't as severe as others but also because I had to stop using the product for a while. I still use it occasionally as a cleanser which works pretty good. The product wasn't for me, but it most likely will work for others.
customer_reviews.author: Anja S.

customer_reviews.title: Has so far almost completely stopped my cystic acne
customer_reviews.text: This product has truly been quite the helpful face wash for me. If you suffer from cystic acne like I did, I would really recommend giving this a try. It has seriously stopped my cystic acne almost completely (aside from the stray pimple here or there of course). Now I also take vitamins, and am an active person so that has to be taken into account as well, but so far this product has seriously helped my acne situation. Would extremely recommend for anyone with ridiculously oily skin like I am cursed with.
customer_reviews.author: Jaccob S.

customer_reviews.title: Worst Product Ever! Beware!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I can give this product 0 stars! My son had an instant reaction to this product. His face swelled up to the point he was not recognizable for 3 days! We saw a doctor and was told we should only put 10 percent Benz on your face for a few seconds not 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money, comparable to any drug store.
customer_reviews.text: I’ll start off by saying that I don’t struggle with “bad,” acne, it’s mostly hormonal break outs around my mouth and chin. This product didn’t help or hurt me. It really didn’t do anything except dry my skin out. A flop if you ask me. (Literally prefer St. Ives which is insane to say)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Boone-Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Beware it may cause hyperpigmentation.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for three days and had to stop because it caused SEVERE hyperpigmentation. I followed the directions and even moisturized after each use. I literally look like someone dashed gasoline on my face and lit me on fire. My acne is gone, but it looks like is my whole face is bruised now. I would post a before and after picture, but I’m humiliated by the way I look now.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Walker

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: this stuff made my eyes puff up. I mean like I couldn't open my eye puff up. I must have had some sort of allergic reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Peppy132

customer_reviews.title: Same problem, different body wash
customer_reviews.text: Have had for at least a month and see no results sadly. Hoping my bacne is just more resilient and I’ll see an improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this product. I bought it for my teenager who has struggled with acne for about a year now. She used it exactly as directed, but unfortuantely did not see results. It was worth a shot, just didn't work for her.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Severe reaction to facial wax
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about 3 weeks. Haven’t really seen any improvements but decided to keep trying. Went and got my lip and eyebrows waxed (the same kind of wax that has been used for 2 years on me) and I had a major reaction. Something in this product had a reaction with the wax. Red bumps and horrible pain. I haven’t used this sense and my reaction has seemed to get better. I won’t be buying this again... so painful.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not a cleansing face soap..
customer_reviews.text: It’s just a light cream wash that doesn’t clean well. The anti acne agents are there but it’s necessary to couple with an exfoliating cleanser to actually cleanse and then lather on this stuff as a preventative measure.
customer_reviews.author: A.lil.blue.bird

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Smell
customer_reviews.text: Smells terrible and I hate that you have to wash it off. I guess I'll stick with acne.org's Benzoyl Peroxide.
customer_reviews.author: Pascal

customer_reviews.title: terrible
customer_reviews.text: It made me breakout even more and is really irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Br

customer_reviews.title: Gunna be honest
customer_reviews.text: My son and I have two different types of skin. I have sensitive skin that is prone to cystic acne. Its hard to tell if it has worked or not to be honest. My son however it did not work for at all, and his skin has been typed by his dermatologist as typical teen acne. I am going to give this 3 stars because I believe its a good product to stay clean and fresh. It may work for others, skin is very different for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Stephenie H.

customer_reviews.title: it dont work
customer_reviews.text: thats all i have 2 say it also made my skin irritated
customer_reviews.author: zh

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this face wash since May 2018 (currently Feb 2019). It looks like the bottle will last about a year if you use it daily (3 squirts per day, too). I am overall pretty happy with it. I get the occasional pimple, not acne, and it helps keep it away for the most part if I use it consistently. It doesn't help with dry skin, so I also use a light daily scrub (Cetaphil) to wash away dead skin. I was thinking of ordering something new, but I will likely re-order this again. Excellent quality for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Helen LL

customer_reviews.title: it seems like the product is working after a month of use
customer_reviews.text: It was shipped on time, when i was going to try it i noticed that the top part was broken, nothing would come out, so every time i had to use it i would removed the top off, it seems like the product is working after a month of use. I would of gave it a 4 star if it wasn’t for the broken one I received.
customer_reviews.author: Alonso Bobadilla

customer_reviews.title: Works works Works works
customer_reviews.text: My teenager has had a hard time dealing with acne. We tried several different kinds of wash with no good lasting results. With in 5 days most of his acne was cleared up. Still gets a little acne but maybe 1 or two pimples a week, before it was like 20-30 pimples on his face. You have to be consistent and use every night. (We only used once a day) We followed the face wash with the toner.
customer_reviews.author: Baseball2018

customer_reviews.title: I saw great results after the first week of use
customer_reviews.text: I thought when I got into my 50's I would be done with acne. But it persisted and even changed. After trying several OTC and a one expensive by-mail products I tried this. Finally, I have control over my skin. I saw great results after the first week of use. Make sure you rinse well and you'll be pleased. This actually does what it says it will.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Didn't solve my acne problem
customer_reviews.text: I brought this hoping it would help with my back acne but it did not seem to help after several uses.
customer_reviews.author: Cilemaqu

customer_reviews.title: Great cream, pump doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Love this cream. It's probably the best I've ever used. I still recommend it despite the 3 star review. I don't have a ton of acne, but what little I do have is now almost completely gone. Leaves skin very dry, which is what you should expect. I subtracted one star for them sending a faulty pump. I subtracted one more star because they know their pumps are bad but they don't bother to fix this.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Skin irritation
customer_reviews.text: This product was ok the first couple of weeks ..I got it January 22 and two days ago my face started to itch so I had to stop using it..I have used benzoyl peroxide 10% before so my face is not new to this but for some reason this face wash is causing my skin to be very itchy so I had to stop the use ..it still made me break out the time I was using it
customer_reviews.author: Monisha

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: My skin can only tolerate it once a day, it’s good for smoothing a ruddy complexion and bleaching the skin of you have red skin issues. But no dramatic change in my acne.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Winegarden

customer_reviews.title: Worsens Acne
customer_reviews.text: Inflames acne horribly. I'd recommend getting an anti-fungal body wash instead.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Urbonas

customer_reviews.title: For those who like "gentle clean"
customer_reviews.text: 10% Benzoyl peroxide is the strongest acne treatment/cleanser you can get without a RX. However, this product is somehow weak. It smells somewhat sour. Following instructions and still not seeing results.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay for now
customer_reviews.text: This product is just okay right now. It doesn't really foam up (which I'm not a fan of), but it works fine. I have sensitive skin and it hasn't irrated me which is a plus, however, I am still experiencing break outs.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Renee

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing :(
customer_reviews.text: Did absolutely nothing for my acne problem. Months using it the bottle is empty and not even 1% improvement!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Clears up your skin but ruins your towels
customer_reviews.text: This face wash was a life changer for my husband, he struggles with adult acne and couldnt figure out how to clear his skin. We went on vacation and he forgot his face wash and broke out within 2 days. Be careful with towels because it will bleach them and if you dont rinse your forehead enough it can give you highlights. Even with those negatives, its still worth using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Works great for all sorts of acne
customer_reviews.text: This product really works, you just have to be patient and give it time. I had very bad acne, all along my cheeks, temples, and forehead. They were large, painful bumps, whiteheads and blackheads. I started using this face wash as instructed, and things got better! But I had a really big problem picking at my face. Within the same week I stopped picking at my face, my acne is almost gone. You have to refrain from touching your face and this will really work! my skin hasn't looked this good in nearly a year. I'm really happy with this product. It does dry out your skin a bit, just be sure to use moisturizer and sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Noora Reifenheiser

customer_reviews.title: Burnt my daughters skin
customer_reviews.text: This burnt my daughters skin pretty severely. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Abigal

customer_reviews.title: BLEACHES CLOTHING!!
customer_reviews.text: I was eager to try this stuff but after only a few uses, I realized it was bleaching my clothes! it ended up ruining some of my favorite shirts and sweatpants. Additionally, I reached out to the manufacturer for a refund but it appears the email on their website is fake or outdated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what a acne product should do!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product has truly been the most effective acne product I have used from age 13 to now 46. I have been on multiple antibiotics, both oral and topical. I have also used Proactive off and on since 2002. This product also seems to physically last longer and is also cheaper. I read the reviews of this product, and did not believe it. I use it once a day. The first night I used it, the next morning, Wow! I’m not paid for this review. I just want to help others that may have suffered from acne all their lives. -Thanks Humane!!
customer_reviews.author: Update42

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!! 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: As a person who’s been dealing with acne, especially cystic acne/hormonal acne.. I am amazed how well this product works to tame my breakouts and overall fight active acne. I use it once a day in affected areas and leave it on for 2-3 minutes before washing. The drying medicinal agent is gentle! So glad I gave benzoyl peroxide a try since I’ve had horrendous results with it in the past. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ZK

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like humane!
customer_reviews.text: It’s been a year since I’ve been using this soap and honestly I can say that this soap has changed my life. I’ve tried everything and nothing worked for me. Since I’ve been on this soap my face has gotten so much better, less breakouts, less marks. I feel beautiful. I feel like me all over again. Thank you. I will be making a review about it on Instagram and YouTube. Also I have sensitive skin and it worked for me 🙃
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: doesn't seem to have short term properties. needs to be used frequently and left on for a few minutes per usage
customer_reviews.author: Jason Byrone

customer_reviews.title: Strong but great!
customer_reviews.text: I was having quite a battle with clogged pores and acne so I bought this hoping it would work! It's really strong but it really worked and helped clear my face quick!
customer_reviews.author: C. Kimhan

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I am on week 4ish of this stuff and I love it. It took about 2 weeks for it to start working but my bacne is 70% gone. Its the best thing I have found and my skin has not looked this good in a long time. It have not experienced drying or any irritation from it. I am only using it on my back with a scrub brush. Love it! I thought I wasnt gonna be able to wear a tank top all summer lol
customer_reviews.author: RockolT

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a week then stopped
customer_reviews.text: It worked for about a week but then I started breaking out again and so I started using it more often and leaving it on longer and all it did was dry my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Paulino

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this consistently and it has made a very big difference in her skin. This product is the only one we have found with 10% benzoyl peroxide and that seems to be what helps with acne.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Really drying
customer_reviews.text: I found this wash to be really drying. Couldn't recommend
customer_reviews.author: Harriett Brookes

customer_reviews.title: Made my skin worse
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this product, especially after reading all the great reviews, but it didn’t work for me. I gave it a solid month to see if things would get better after reading about the “purging stage,” and it never did. It broke my face out soooo bad.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa T

customer_reviews.title: Granted the amount of acne may alter depending on the degree of stress I'm experiencing and/or poor diet. However for the most part
customer_reviews.text: 24 yo male, struggled with moderate to severe acne throughout middle to the beginning of freshman year of undergrad. I used some other products that reduced my acne to the low moderate amounts, but the acne was still somewhat. I've been using this product for the last 3 months and my acne has gone down to mild to almost none. Granted the amount of acne may alter depending on the degree of stress I'm experiencing and/or poor diet. However for the most part, this product has kept my skin almost acne free. I'd recommend this product to someone who's struggling with acne.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: I think it works different for people sometimes but for me it's worked really well and I have sensitive skin. It got rid of the little bit of persistent acne I had. My face got super red at first and hurt but I got used to it and after maybe 3 uses I don't have any acne what so ever. I did have very little to begin with but still I do recommend you give it a go.
customer_reviews.author: francisco munoz

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried many products in the past for my cystic acne. This product has by far exceeded my expectations. My acne has cleared up quicker than other products I’ve tried. It has a nice lather, but make sure and rinse your face thoroughly. Yes I will be buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Carla willoughby

customer_reviews.title: Best Product Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best face wash I have ever found. I've tried everything else, including Proactive and X-Out. I have extremely sensitive skin and have dealt with chronic acne for years. This stuff leaves me face feeling soft and healthy; It doesn't dry out my skin or anything. There isn't a strong odor that comes with it either. This product is honestly a life saver for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great for stubborn acne
customer_reviews.text: At nearly 30 and pregnant I developed major acne. Hello hormones! I tried everything. Then I came across this! Love love love this product! Cleared my acne nearly immediately and kept it away! Some notes though, this dries your skin pretty bad. You most definitely need to purchase a lightweight moisturizer. This product works better if you leave it on a couple minutes..but careful too long and your face will be HOT! I did notice my face was very red immediately after use and at first burned a little but it subsided quickly and again use moisturizer! This is my favorite acne face wash on the market!!
customer_reviews.author: Kasie

customer_reviews.title: Like better than its competitor
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I'm allowed to name the name brand (or other brand) version of this in my review but my dermatologist recommended PanOxyl. I used that for awhile but the new formula ended up thinner so I decided to try the Humane. This definitely drys out your skin, but so does anything with this high a concentration of benzoyl peroxide. I honestly think that this has helped my skin a lot, and I use the CeraVe cream to keep the dryness from getting to be too much. Definitely worth trying!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about 3 months and i see amazing results! While I still get the occasional pimple on my back or chest the amount and frequency has drastically diminished! I am very happy with this product and will be recommending and buying again! I know that no product is perfect but this has been by far the best acne product I have come across yet! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: CWill

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this face wash for almost a month and it has helped my face stay pretty clear. I'm definitely going to continue to use it I also take acne medicine but I havent had my medicine for a week and continued to use this daily and now I'm gonna start accutane after my dermatologist appt today but this face wash helps I promise! Try it wont know until you try it. Theres a reason it's a little pricey for a face wash but to be honest it's cheap for the results you get from it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth benner

customer_reviews.title: Have been using for three weeks and really like it.
customer_reviews.text: Much larger than I thought. Have been using for three weeks and really like it.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: I went from painful inflamed cystic acne to very little to NO break ...
customer_reviews.text: I went from painful inflamed cystic acne to very little to NO break outs and when I would have a blemish this HUMANE line will clear it up in a day or so. I re order every other month because its better than any brand I have ordered yet. the pump never worked tho, that's why its not 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Angie N

customer_reviews.title: Don’t love it
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work well for me. My skin does respond well to benzoyl peroxide typically but maybe this was too strong - irritated my skin too much.
customer_reviews.author: lauren danford

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical
customer_reviews.text: I’ve just recently started getting acne at 31 yo, it was like the cystic acne they would get huge and never come to a head just extremely sore and swollen to the point there was ALWAYs one or two bumps at all times on my chin. I wish I had gotten before pics. After about a month of consistent use (I wash twice daily) my breakouts have become almost none existent even during my menstrual cycle, when I do get a bump it’s very tiny and goes away in about a day, in this pic the brown spots are left from my breakouts other than that my chin is clear!!!
customer_reviews.author: brittany ballew

customer_reviews.title: Finally!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 38 year old male, I’ve never really had any acne issues my entire life. Then 2 years ago my forehead gave me the bird. I haven’t had a breakout in the 2 months I’ve been using this product. I’ve had a few small pimples that went away in a couple of days but never a breakout. I haven’t experienced any dryness really or irritation. This product is great, finally feels like acne can be controlled as long as you stick with it.
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the product,will buy again.It's they only one that works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best I’ve used so far
customer_reviews.text: Okay y’all let me tell you about this product . This is my second time purchasing and I MUST leave a review . I will let you know that first this product will not work over night . Second your face will get bad first before it gets better . I’ve been using this for 7 months now and I see a MAJOR difference in my skin. My face is much smoother then before barely it would only be like 1 or 2 pimples here and there .. I will upload pics soon ..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I have cystic acne due to stress and extremely oily skin, and I have been using this for about 7 weeks now and it has only made my skin burn and make my acne worse and redder. Also, the bottle pump does not work well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie Sizemore

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I looked up acne products for sensitive skin and this comes up, so I bought it since it had really good reviews. I get it in the mail, only to read the label, where it says something along the lines of "do not use if you have sensitive skin".... ????
customer_reviews.author: Queen E

customer_reviews.title: Effective, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wash if you need a strong benzoyl peroxide treatment for various skin conditions. The directions that came with it were the most thorough I have seen on any product, while being easy to understand and to the point. You are instructed to leave the product on your skin for 1-2 minutes, which does make it a little tricky in the shower--but not their fault!
customer_reviews.author: TX customer 9876

customer_reviews.title: Best acne wash I've tried.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Helped clear and brighten my face. I was having issues with darker red splotchiness from acne on my face. I've had the redness for a good part of a year and would not clear up due to the constant break outs. I've always have had adult acne but it's been harder to get clearer skin as I'm getting older. After using this product I started feeling and seeing a huge improvement. I'm not 100% clear yet but this product has done more for me than any other product I've tried. I'm happy to know that I'm improving and moving in a more positive direction with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Whan M Je

customer_reviews.title: This is also a great company that sent along valuable advice for using the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, cleared up some trouble areas on my face. This is also a great company that sent along valuable advice for using the product.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Cupo

customer_reviews.title: If I could give this 10 stars I would.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been fighting cystic acne since I got pregnant 8 years ago. I’ve been to multiple doctors, dermatologists, been on many prescriptions, tried going all natural. You name it, I did it. I’ve been using this for a little over a month. This is the first month in 8 years I’ve had a clear face. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Good if you do not have sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I unfortunately made the mistake of continuing with a product that gave my cystic acne and comedones, and benzoyl peroxide so far is the only product that has helped me get rid of and prevent those. This one is stronger than most, but I like that it is a wash and not a serum you keep on your skin. If your skin can tolerate it and you have acne prone skin I'd recommend this product, its helped me a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Voidbringer

customer_reviews.title: Came with too many warnings, freaked me out.
customer_reviews.text: I gave 3 stars, for me the item was just too much. It came with too many warnings and it freaked me out. So I gave it to my Aunt who doesn't have sensitive skin or allergies like I do, and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Cloudie ~

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't irritate skin
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife and she liked it. She said it doesn't irritate her skin and the product works well.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: THIS WORKS.
customer_reviews.text: First off, I would like to say I normally have oily skin and I never have acne but when I got on the depo shot I started breaking out so bad. I tried everything and nothing changed it. When I came across this and tried it out , I seen a change the first day!!! I’m on my third day and this is working amazing on my face like all my pimples are dried up already and clearing. This is literally amazing. I use it twice a day & leave it on my face for 5 minutes after use. Now I just have to get rid of my acne scores and blemishes I highly reccomend this
customer_reviews.author: chiara

customer_reviews.title: Will see results in a couple days
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I’ve tried just about every acne product there is and none have been successful as this one. I actually bought it on a whim since I just needed a new acne product to try to suppress my acne issue. This product has made my skin so smooth, wow! The first two days I had small bumps because they were all premature pimples this product was getting rid of. After the 4 th day, my skin was blemish free and my skin was so smooth! I’m definitely going to keep buying this product. I’m glad this product worked on my skin 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Cindy lou

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing! I've been using it on my back and ...
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing! I've been using it on my back and it's been clearing everything up. I hardly get back outbreaks now. Best product I've ever tried.
customer_reviews.author: Fab

customer_reviews.title: Beware the faulty pump
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this product but the pump doesn't even work. I have only seen one other reviewer mention this pitfall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Acne Body Wash
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Best thing I've found to clear up back acne issues.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Herrell

customer_reviews.title: Dries skin, but effective
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed a significant reduction of acne vulgaris after using a small amount on my face in the shower for several days. It doesn't affect cystic acne, since that is hormonal and too deep under the skin for topical treatments to be effective. However, the overall appearance of my skin is smoother and healthier. The only problem I have with it is that it makes my skin very dry, so I need to apply moisturizer after getting out of the shower. However, I consider this a small price to pay for clear skin.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Miller

customer_reviews.title: Did not help ):
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product was not what I was expecting . Instead of clearing my skin , I broke out worse which left more dark spots .
customer_reviews.author: Lw

customer_reviews.title: After 3 weeks, my acne are still there.
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt work. My acne are still there. It looks like i gain some acne. I use this product and moisturizer and looks like i have more acne.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: It helped me with a pesky dance problem I had ...
customer_reviews.text: It helped me with a pesky ance problem I was having. The only downfall was that some of my towels were ruined, other than that I really enjoyed this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great on back and chest acne
customer_reviews.text: My teenage daughter uses as a body wash to control chest and back acne. This product works great for her! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: H. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great for teenage acne
customer_reviews.text: This product has been amazing for my teenage son and the acne he was experiencing on his back. He didn’t experience any excessive drying but we have been using rosehip oil in conjunction with this , so perhaps that’s why. Overall very good product
customer_reviews.author: Colt

customer_reviews.title: Clear skin!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cleared everything up after two weeks. At first my acne got a bit worse but it seems it happened because it was pulling all the underlying acne to the surface. Once my face cleared up after the second week I haven't had an outbreak, that was five months ago. Totally worth the money and the bottle, 8oz., last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for me
customer_reviews.text: A couple of years ago I started getting a lot of hormonal acne along my jaw line. Knowing that it was hormonal I didn’t really try to do much to treat it except for keeping the area clean and not picking at it. But around Christmas time last year it started to flare up and with more deep cystic ones I knew I had to try something. This product had such great reviews and price was reasonable so i decided it wouldn’t hurt to try. I am so happy to say that it has worked wonders for my skin. Not only is the acne controlled but I notice my pores are cleaner which makes them appear smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Celine W

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived on time. Still using this product and ...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time. Still using this product and it appears to be working.
customer_reviews.author: Staying healthy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Acne Killer
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, you can feel the strength of it on your skin, and if you apply a non-oil moisturizer it feels amazing. I seriously reccomend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Van Dyke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use bottle for application. product works well. price is bit higher than other products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Humane Face & Body Acne Wash, 10% Benzoyl Peroxide Acne Treatment, Oil-free, Paraben-free, Dermatologist-Tested, 8 oz
feature_bullets: MAXIMUM-STRENGTH ACNE TREATMENT. Contains 10% benzoyl peroxide, a powerful acne medication proven to kill acne-causing bacteria, unclog pores and reduce inflammation.

FACE AND BODY ACNE WASH. Non-foaming cleanser (SLS-free) absorbs quickly and can be used as a face acne treatment, body acne treatment, back acne treatment, butt acne treatment, cystic acne treatment, adult acne treatment and acne treatment for teens.
DERMATOLOGIST-TESTED. This 10% benzoyl peroxide acne medication has been evaluated for safety at an independent laboratory.
CLEAN, VEGAN AND CRUELTY-FREE. No parabens, no sulfates, no formaldehyde, no synthetic fragrance/color and no animal byproducts.
WE STAND BEHIND OUR PRODUCTS. Email us for a refund. 100% satisfaction or your money back. No return necessary.
